Name: Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer
Title: "Whirling Memories" Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer
Desc: "The children of the desert have a rich tradition of song and dance. Originally used to praise and serve the gods, the crafts were later adapted for battle and the seduction of kings."
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer

C127033.Name: Spirit-Serpent's Blessing
C127033.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your $[C127032] uses $[K58]:</color> The DMG dealt by this $[K58] +1, and does not consume $[K3] of $[C127032].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack, no limit)

C127032.Name: Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent
C127032.Desc: $[K58]: $[S1270321]\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>\n(A character can only equip 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique at a time)

K58.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique</color>
K58.Desc: When the active character is equipped with a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique card, they can use the corresponding {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008} Technique counts as a Combat Action. If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K58.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique</color>
K58.Desc: When the active character is equipped with a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique card, they can use the corresponding {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008} Technique counts as a Combat Action. If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.

K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

27033.Name: Spirit of Omen's Awakening: Dendro Spirit-Serpent
27033.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. Once each Match, add 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C127032]</color> card to your Hand.\n(Characters with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C127032]</color> equipped can use the Technique: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S1270321]</color>)

If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.

27034.Name: Spirit of Omen's Power
27034.Desc: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character takes DMG:</color> If this character has no more than 7 HP, they gain 1 $[K310]. (Once per Round)

K310.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>
K310.Desc: Characters must consume {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.\nWhen characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy.
